SEARCH

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
Shape
Circle
public class Circle extends Shape
A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas. Refactored to inherit from Shape class for better code reusability.
Version:
3.0 (October 2025)
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes (Refactored for Ciclo 1-3)

      Scale the circle by a factor.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
